divs: Sighting DetailsI observed the object for over 2 hours. During that time I attempted toasertain why the object seemed to dwell over a specific area. My assumption isthat the object was perhaps over the site of the now decommissioned TrojanNucular Power Plant. I also observed what appeared to be tiny flashbulb typelights both around and moving from below up twards the object. The presence tothese lights was not constant. I observed the lights 4 or 5 times during the 2hours.I would appreciate knowing if you are able to link my observation with anyothers. Thank you.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in St Helens
There were no other sightings in St Helens on or around February 7th 2001
Summary: Unusual object in the sky observed from my home
